address.street: University College Cork, 6 Elderwood, College Road

procedure.title: Establishment of a Single Supplier Framework of Quantity Surveying and Cost Consultancy Services for Buildings and Estates Office, University College Cork
procedure.description: This Tender is to establish Single Supplier Framework for Quantity Surveying and Cost Consultancy Services to whom specific tasks may be awarded on an exclusive basis based on the terms of a framework agreement. The deliverables are 16 hours per week for 48 weeks i.e. 52 weeks minus annual leave, for the duration of the framework agreement, working on various tasks and projects under the direction of the Director of Buildings and Estates, the Capital Projects Officer and the Buildings Officer from September 2024 to September 2028.
